channel.title: Client HELP!?
channel.description:
Okay.. I have seen this before.. I want to make the login box background Transparent.. Along with the buttons.. So I want it to where all you see is the words and the background of my client.. If I have to keep the frames I will but I would like them gone if I could do that..
Here is a picture to maybe help explain what i want... [img]http://slashdelta.do.am/question.bmp[/img]
Anyone HELP!??

item.title: Client HELP!?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Brenz, post:2, topic:233678”]I think the only way to do it is to work out that area of the background and then follow a tut on changing them which can be found with a quick SEARCH of mopar or google.

Otherwise it just mucks it all up as you open more windows.

Brendan[/quote]

Yeah i tried searching and found nothing… But thanks for the help…

ANYONE ELSE??

Read full topic

item.title: Client HELP!?
item.dc:creator: @Brenz Brenz
item.description:
@Brenz wrote:

I think the only way to do it is to work out that area of the background and then follow a tut on changing them which can be found with a quick SEARCH of mopar or google.

Otherwise it just mucks it all up as you open more windows.

Brendan
